name: Drift Car Arena
description:
How long your derby car can survive while big trucks are on your tail. It’s time to show off your mad driving skills by avoiding and outclassing the fearless derby cars and big trucks. The ultimate car chase of 2019 is here where you will show your drifting skills to avoid upcoming cars in Drift Car Mayhem Arena.

Easy to play but hard to master. Getaway drift car arena is addictive challenging game where your racer skills will make the enemies to smash into each other. Crash your way through hot pursuit racing journey where timing and drifting matters. Avoid police cars, big derby trucks, mini cars while mastering your near miss skills.

Dodge the heat and collect coins to unlock tons of cars. You can collect speed boost to smash enemy cars. But make sure you don’t get too damaged, or you’ll end up wasted so keep collecting health packs while racing. Keep eye on boss truck, it will come from nowhere to destroy your smash car. Feel the heat and mayhem of cars in drift car mayhem arena.

Features of getaway derby car mayhem
• Highly Addictive game play
• Lot of colorful cars to unlock
• Simple controls just tap left right to drift
• Collect coins, boosts and health packs
• Catchy graphics
